item.description:
We will be integrating many healing modalities to create one unified relaxing experience.

Take an inward journey of healing toward a renewal of body and mind through sound healing, restorative yoga, and therapeutic touch. Together, these three techniques will help you reach a deep layer of release.

Over the course of the two-hour workshop, you will receive guided therapeutic restorative yoga poses with hands-on adjustments using Thai Yoga massage, and Reiki. Ending with a sound-healing meditation where we will explore the power of the gongs and singing bowls to balance your energy centers in the body and experience vibrational wellness.

Call Darnell with any questions at 857-526-2200

group.name: The Light Within - Yoga, Reiki, Meditation - Dorchester MA

item.name: Restorative Yoga, Sound Healing, Reiki and Meditation Class with Mary & Darnell
